abs.name: ABS (Anti-lock Braking System)
abs.hint: Assets: wheel speed sensors, brake pressure sensors, hydraulic modulator (valves/pumps), ABS ECU MCU, CAN bus, sensor harness, wheel speed sensor cables, diagnostic port (OBD-II), braking actuators, power supply/relays.

bms.name: BMS (Battery Management System)
bms.hint: Assets: cell monitoring ICs, battery cell strings, battery management MCU, balancing circuits, contactors/contactor drivers, charger interface (AC/DC), high-voltage harness, CAN/vehicle network, thermal sensors, FETs, secure element (if present), firmware storage.

tcu.name: TCU (Telematics Control Unit)
tcu.hint: Assets: cellular modem (4G/5G), SIM/eSIM, Wi-Fi/Bluetooth module, GNSS/GPS receiver, telematics cloud APIs, OTA update client, telematics app tokens/credentials, CAN/Ethernet gateway, microphone (if present), storage for logs/telemetry.

telematics.name: Telematics System
telematics.hint: Assets: telematics backend servers, vehicle-cloud APIs, OTA servers, data synchronization modules, mobile app interfaces, security certificates, tokens, and telemetry storage.

ecs.name: ECU - General (Electronic Control Unit)
ecs.hint: Assets: MCU/SoC, firmware flash, RAM, bootloader, secure boot, debug ports (JTAG/UART), vehicle network interfaces (CAN, LIN, FlexRay, Ethernet), power supply, external memory, diagnostic interface.

ecm.name: ECM / Powertrain (Engine Control Module)
ecm.hint: Assets: engine sensors (MAP, TPS, temperature sensors), fuel injectors, ignition drivers, ECU MCU, CAN bus, OBD-II diagnostic port, firmware, calibration files, actuators.

adas.name: ADAS ECU
adas.hint: Assets: camera sensors, radar units, lidar (if present), sensor fusion module, perception software, ADAS ECU MCU, CAN/ethernet vehicle network, braking/steering actuators, model weights storage, OTA, V2X interface.

infotainment.name: Infotainment Head Unit
infotainment.hint: Assets: head unit OS (Linux/Android/QNX), Bluetooth/Wi-Fi, USB ports, media playback components, telephony stacks, application layer, navigation maps, microphone/speakers, CAN gateway, app store/update mechanisms.

gateway.name: Gateway / Domain Controller
gateway.hint: Assets: inter-bus routing (CAN<->Ethernet), firewall/filtering rules, ECU message broker, OTA gateway, secure gateway credentials, firmware, management interface.

eps.name: EPS (Electric Power Steering)
eps.hint: Assets: torque sensor, steering angle sensor, power assist motor/driver, EPS MCU, CAN bus, position sensors, safety watchdog, actuator drivers, mechanical linkages.

airbag.name: Airbag / SRS ECU
airbag.hint: Assets: crash sensors (accelerometers), airbag control unit, deployment circuits, backup power (capacitor), diagnostic port, firmware, safety watchdog, connectors.

bcm.name: BCM (Body Control Module)
bcm.hint: Assets: door modules, lighting controllers, remote keyless entry, CAN bus, low-speed LIN buses, user interface inputs (switches, buttons), immobilizer interface, BCM firmware.

charger.name: EV Charger Interface / Onboard Charger
charger.hint: Assets: charger control MCU, J1772/CCS/GB/T interface, charging protocols (OCPP, ISO15118), contactors, pilot signal, CAN or charger comms, power electronics, OTA (charger firmware).

motor_controller.name: Motor Controller / Inverter
motor_controller.hint: Assets: inverter control MCU, gate drivers, phase current sensors, CAN/ethernet, PWM drivers, thermal sensors, isolation barriers, firmware, control algorithms.

cluster.name: Instrument Cluster
cluster.hint: Assets: display(s), gauge drivers, cluster MCU, CAN interface, vehicle sensors aggregation, UI apps, firmware storage, diagnostic port.

door_control.name: Door Control Module
door_control.hint: Assets: door lock actuators, window motors, keyless entry interface, CAN/LIN bus, remote fob interface, sensors, diagnostic port.

keyless_entry.name: Keyless Entry / Smart Key System
keyless_entry.hint: Assets: RF/key fob receivers, BLE/NFC modules, immobilizer systems, rolling code algorithms, back-end cloud auth (if applicable), vehicle bus interface.

hvac.name: HVAC Controller
hvac.hint: Assets: HVAC control MCU, blower motor drivers, temperature sensors, actuators (blend doors), CAN/LIN, user interface, firmware.

ota_server.name: OTA Server / Update System
ota_server.hint: Assets: update packages repository, signing keys, CI/CD pipeline, distribution endpoints, authentication tokens, logging, infrastructure network.

diagnostic.name: Diagnostic Interface (OBD-II / JTAG / UART)
diagnostic.hint: Assets: diagnostic ports, debug interfaces, bootloader unlock, authorized debug credentials, physical access paths, diagnostic tools/software.

v2x.name: V2X Communication Module
v2x.hint: Assets: V2X radio, protocol stacks, certificates/PKI, RSU interactions, message broker, OTA for stack updates.

gps.name: GNSS / GPS Receiver
gps.hint: Assets: GNSS antenna/receiver, raw location data, time sync, GNSS-assisted features, signal processing, anti-spoofing (if present).

lidar.name: Lidar Sensor System
lidar.hint: Assets: laser emitter, photodetector, scanning mechanism, signal processing unit, CAN/Ethernet link, firmware, calibration data.

radar.name: Radar Sensor System
radar.hint: Assets: RF transceiver, antenna array, DSP unit, CAN/Ethernet, perception software, calibration data, firmware.

camera.name: Camera Sensor System
camera.hint: Assets: image sensors, ISP, vision processing MCU, CAN/Ethernet interface, model weights, lens calibration data, firmware.

tpms.name: TPMS (Tire Pressure Monitoring System)
tpms.hint: Assets: tire pressure sensors, RF transmitters, receiver module, CAN/LIN interface, control algorithms, firmware.

obd.name: OBD-II Diagnostic Port
obd.hint: Assets: physical OBD-II port, diagnostic lines, CAN/K-line connection, access control, diagnostic tool communication.

bluetooth.name: Bluetooth Interface
bluetooth.hint: Assets: Bluetooth transceiver, pairing credentials, MAC addresses, driver stack, OS APIs, firmware, vehicle access layer.

wifi.name: Automotive Wi-Fi Module
wifi.hint: Assets: Wi-Fi chip, SSID/passkey storage, firmware, telematics bridge, OTA update link, external antennas.

can_bus.name: CAN Bus Network
can_bus.hint: Assets: CAN transceivers, message frames, arbitration IDs, ECUs, terminators, connectors, message filters.

lin_bus.name: LIN Bus Network
lin_bus.hint: Assets: LIN master/slave nodes, serial interface, transceivers, message IDs, timing sync, harness.

flexray.name: FlexRay Network
flexray.hint: Assets: FlexRay controllers, bus channels A/B, timing schedule tables, ECU interfaces, connectors, protocol stack.

zonal.name: Zonal ECU
zonal.hint: Assets: multi-domain controllers, Ethernet backbones, CAN/LIN bridges, centralized computing modules, firmware partitions.

sensor_fusion.name: Sensor Fusion Module
sensor_fusion.hint: Assets: sensor fusion algorithms, ADAS input data streams, AI models, data buses (CAN/Ethernet), MCU/SoC.

brake_control.name: Brake Control System
brake_control.hint: Assets: hydraulic control unit, pedal sensors, actuators, CAN communication, safety controllers, firmware.

throttle.name: Throttle Control System
throttle.hint: Assets: throttle position sensors, actuator motor, ECU drivers, CAN bus, calibration data, firmware.

steering.name: Steering ECU
steering.hint: Assets: steering motor controller, torque sensors, angle sensors, ECU firmware, CAN bus, safety watchdogs.

charging_port.name: Automotive Charging Port
charging_port.hint: Assets: charging inlet, pilot/control lines, relay/contactor, charge controller MCU, comms module, insulation monitoring.

mobile_app.name: Vehicle Mobile App
mobile_app.hint: Assets: mobile app credentials, APIs, Bluetooth/Wi-Fi link, telematics API tokens, command/control messages, authentication.

voice_assistant.name: Automotive Voice Assistant Integration
voice_assistant.hint: Assets: microphone array, voice AI model, internet connectivity, cloud speech APIs, telematics bridge, CAN command interface.

rfid_entry.name: RFID Entry System
rfid_entry.hint: Assets: RFID transceiver, tag authentication keys, ECU link, firmware, power relay, door control logic.

immobilizer.name: Immobilizer System
immobilizer.hint: Assets: transponder keys, receiver coils, immobilizer ECU, cryptographic keys, CAN bus link, firmware.

ivi.name: IVI (In-Vehicle Infotainment) System
ivi.hint: Assets: infotainment OS, apps, user accounts, Bluetooth/Wi-Fi, media services, storage, CAN/Ethernet bridge.

digital_cockpit.name: Digital Cockpit
digital_cockpit.hint: Assets: multi-display interface, instrument cluster link, infotainment OS, HMI layers, graphics controllers, user data.

usb.name: USB Interface
usb.hint: Assets: USB ports, data lines, driver stack, charging controller, firmware update mechanism, OS interface.

hdmi.name: HDMI Port (Automotive IVI)
hdmi.hint: Assets: HDMI PHY, display controller, infotainment MCU interface, input routing, firmware.

media_interface.name: Media Player Interface
media_interface.hint: Assets: multimedia codec layers, streaming services, app integrations, user storage, audio processors, CAN/IVI bridge.

e_call.name: E-call System
e_call.hint: Assets: eSIM, cellular modem, microphone, crash detection logic, emergency call module, telematics API.

telematics_cloud.name: Telematics Cloud API
telematics_cloud.hint: Assets: cloud server endpoints, telematics data store, authentication keys, OTA interface, web APIs, vehicle tokens.

vehicle_config.name: Vehicle Configuration API
vehicle_config.hint: Assets: configuration databases, authentication layer, CAN signals mapping, telematics interfaces, OTA settings.
